_instructions: To add a new reflection, go to https://pauseforsuicide.com/tools/add-reflection.html â€” Paste message, generate code, and add it below.

reflections.message: thank you for this place, i just found it.
An incredible site ... filled with hope. Remember you matter.
Tomorrow can be better, you just need to be here for it.
A wonderful tool to have no matter where you are in your journey.
Sometimes things feel so dark. A mate sent me this. I felt like I could make it again. So thanks.

message: i had a tough time over christmas. everything felt tough and I just wanted to disappear into myself and stop. then a friend showed up out of nowhere and pulled me out. i actually had a good time. you just dont know whats around the corner
